def main():
    t=input()
    while t:
        t-=1
        n=input()
        ar = map(int,raw_input().split())
        de = map(int,raw_input().split())
        lim = max(de)
        guests = [0]*lim
        for i in xrange(n):
            for j in xrange(ar[i],de[i]):
                guests[j]+=1
        print max(guests)
main()
